comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: And who does that today?  The tree has to be perfectly shaped and decorated.  Few use real trees.  Another era gone..

comment.author: 11457109@N08
comment._content: We used to go out to a Christmas Tree farm and cut our own tree, but the past 10 years or so, we've bought our tree from the local Optimist Club.  I dont think I could use a fake tree.

comment.author: 48513457@N00
comment._content: Great image! My wife and I have always cut down a tree growing up, and now that we have a couple mutts and a little guy, it makes it all the more special to continue our tradition:

comment.author: 99217767@N00
comment._content:
Who decorates their tree on Christmas eve?  Wait till Christmas eve around here and you will not be getting a tree, they're all sold by then.

I too like real trees, but may go to an artificial this year just to avoid putting that darn lights on a live one.
